# The most common crystalstructure for an element. The names in () are
# the german translations of the names
# hcp: hexagonal close-packed
# bcc: body centered cubic (kubisch raumzentriert)
# ccp: cubic close packed (kubisch dichteste Kugelpackung)
# rh : rhombohedral / trigonal
# or : orthorhombic
# mono: monoclinic
# tri: triclinic
# tp: tetragonal primitive
# sc: simple cubic
#
# Sources: see crystalstructures.bibxml
# License: The MIT License
